snippet: The retailer, which just two years ago appeared to be teetering on the brink of collapse, says it is now back on sound footing.
abstract: J C Penney chief executive Myron E Ullman III tells analysts that company is back on sound footing, just two years after it appeared to be teetering on brink of collapse.
lead_paragraph: The retailer, which just two years ago appeared to be teetering on the brink of collapse, says it is now back on sound footing.

headline.main: Return to Traditions Spurs Optimism at J. C. Penney
headline.print_headline: Return to Traditions Spurs Optimism at J. C. Penney
